name: Rowdy Randy
description:
Randall (Rowdy Randy) McVandal must save humanity from the robot overlords by collecting the cassettes that house the codes necessary in shutting them down. Newly ported to the PC this classic FunFella game has been given new life!

Works on PC and Mobile. 

PC Controls : 

-WASD movement

-Spacebar to Jump

-Left Mouse Click to shoot

Mobile Controls :

-Directional Pad movement

-A Button to Jump

-B Button to Shoot

Known Bugs : 

When pressing down or up on a ladder on PC occasionally Randy wont move unless you also go left or right.

Buttons no longer animate on mobile ever since implementing PC controls
